group_device_limitation.title: Group Device Has Limited API Support
group_device_limitation.description:
The device **{device_name}** is a Govee Home app group device (SameModeGroup, BaseGroup, or DreamViewScenic).

These group devices have **experimental support** in this integration:
- Control commands work (on/off, brightness, color, scenes)
- State queries fail - device will use optimistic state tracking
- Device shows as available even when state cannot be queried

This is a limitation of the Govee cloud API. Group devices created in the Govee Home app do not support state queries via the API.

**Recommendation:** If you need accurate state feedback, control individual devices instead of groups.

rate_limit_minute_warning.title: Approaching Per-Minute Rate Limit
rate_limit_minute_warning.description:
Your Govee integration is approaching the API rate limit.

**Current status:** {remaining} requests remaining this minute (limit: 100/minute)

**What this means:**
- If the limit is exceeded, API requests will be delayed automatically
- You may experience slower response times

**Recommended actions:**
- Increase the poll interval in integration options
- Reduce the number of devices being polled
- Avoid excessive manual refresh operations

This warning will clear automatically when the rate limit resets.

rate_limit_day_warning.title: Approaching Daily Rate Limit
rate_limit_day_warning.description:
Your Govee integration is approaching the daily API rate limit.

**Current status:** {remaining} requests remaining today (limit: 10,000/day)

**What this means:**
- If the daily limit is exceeded, API requests may fail
- The integration may stop updating device states

**Recommended actions:**
- **Immediately increase** the poll interval in integration options (recommended: 60+ seconds)
- Consider reducing the number of devices
- The daily limit resets at midnight UTC

This warning will clear automatically when the rate limit resets.

auth_failed.title: Govee Authentication Failed
auth_failed.description:
The Govee API key is no longer valid.

**What this means:**
- The integration cannot communicate with Govee servers
- Device control and state updates will not work

**How to fix:**
1. Go to Settings → Devices & Services → Govee
2. Click 'Configure' or 'Reconfigure'
3. Enter a new valid API key

**Getting a new API key:**
1. Open the Govee Home app
2. Go to Profile → Settings → About Us → Apply for API Key
